snippet: Without the restructuring, Greece would probably default this month.
abstract: Greece moves closer to avoiding default when the Institute of International Finance, a large group of private sector bondholders, says it will participate in a restructuring through a bond swap.
lead_paragraph: Without the restructuring, Greece would probably default this month.

headline.seo: Large Holders of Greek Debt Agree to Bond Swap
headline.main: Large Private Sector Investors Agree to a Swap of Greek Debt
headline.print_headline: Large Private Sector Investors Agree to a Swap of Greek Debt
